name: UpdateJobOpening
description:
Update the details of a job opening.

This tool updates the details of a specified job opening. It requires the 'jobsWrite' permission. For setting custom field values on openings, use the dedicated customFields.setValue endpoint.

parameters.name: opening_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the job opening to update.

value_schema.description: The openingId of the opening you want to update.

parameters.name: fields_to_update
parameters.description: Specify the fields you want to update, such as jobIds, targetHireDate, targetStartDate, isBackfill, employmentType.

parameters.name: job_description_update
parameters.description: The new description text for the job opening. Provide a detailed and clear update relevant to the job role.

parameters.name: department_team_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the department or team associated with the job opening.

value_schema.description: The id of the department or team associated with the opening.

parameters.name: target_hire_date
parameters.description: The date in YYYY-MM-DD format by which you intend to hire for the opening.

value_schema.description: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) by which you intend to hire against this opening.

parameters.name: target_start_date
parameters.description: The intended start date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) for a newly hired employee.

value_schema.description: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) by which you intend someone hired against this opening will start employment.

parameters.name: employment_type
parameters.description: Specifies the employment type for the job opening. Can be FullTime, PartTime, Intern, Contract, or Temporary.

value_schema.description: The employment type for this opening

parameters.name: is_backfill
parameters.description: Indicate if the opening is intended to backfill an employee. Use true for backfill, false otherwise.

value_schema.description: Whether this opening is intended to backfill a previous employee

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API

parameters.name: openingId
parameters.description: The openingId of the opening you want to update.

value_schema.description: The openingId of the opening you want to update.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The id of the department or team associated with the opening.

value_schema.description: The id of the department or team associated with the opening.

parameters.name: targetHireDate
parameters.description: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) by which you intend to hire against this opening.

value_schema.description: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) by which you intend to hire against this opening.

parameters.name: targetStartDate
parameters.description: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) by which you intend someone hired against this opening will start employment.

value_schema.description: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) by which you intend someone hired against this opening will start employment.

parameters.name: isBackfill
parameters.description: Whether this opening is intended to backfill a previous employee

value_schema.description: Whether this opening is intended to backfill a previous employee

parameters.name: employmentType
parameters.description: The employment type for this opening

value_schema.description: The employment type for this opening
